urls.description: The Community Liaison meeting at the landfill site took place last Wednesday. This is a regular meeting which happens twice a year. This time attendance was higher than usual, because of the major smell problems this year. Five Biffa managers and three Environment Agency staff, including their landfill gas specialist, were there, along with two staff from Surrey County Council Planning Dept, two local councillors (me and Jonathan Essex), two Nutfield Parish councillors, and eight residents, one representin
